response.overview: Legendary director Hark Tsui adapts the story of Wong Fei Hung, a character from Tsui's Once Upon a Time in China film series in this superb animated feature. After foreign agents unleash a malevolent spirit on China, Wong must battle the evil it brings. But can he save the planet from this catastrophic force? This high-octane martial arts fantasy is jam-packed with dynamic fight scenes choreographed by Tsui himself.
response.title: The Warrior
